column1: The Plaintiff; Respondent in this case was given at the end of the trial an 8 feet
right of way over the land of the Defendant--Appellant, in order to access his land:

column2: The Defendant; Appellant Impugns this grant of 8 feet on the basis that a previous

column1: partition action (DC Kandy P /7050) had resulted in the grant of only a 3 feet right
of way and this previous decree operates as a res judicata and the widening of the
right of way to a 8 feet  cart way could not have been granted in the 2nd  action;
